noAuthInMobile: You must log in on a computer to access this page.

modal.firstContent: I would like to see sources from
modal.deleteBlockText: Are you sure you want to delete this block?
modal.deteleStorymapText: Are you sure you want to delete this storymap?
modal.deteleMapText: Are you sure you want to delete this map?

deleteUserText.another: Are you sure you want to delete this user? This action is irreversible.
deleteUserText.yourself: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action is irreversible.

modal.modifyUserStatusText: Are you sure you want to change the status of this user?

cleanPointSetText.bdd: Are you sure you want to delete all DB points in this point set?
cleanPointSetText.custom: Are you sure you want to delete all custom points in this point set?

modal.deleteTagText: Are you sure you want to delete this tag? If this tag only is used in a map or a storymap, it will be removed from the home page.

mapPage.enlargeYourSearch: Expand your search or reset all filters.
mapPage.noGreekOrSemitic: neither in greek, neither in semitic

aside.filterIntroduction: A testimony is displayed if it matches at least one option from each filter. Once the filters are applied, the filters update according to the visible testimonies.
aside.noSelectedMarker: Select a marker to see details

backoffice.noPointInPointSet: No point loaded in this point set

tags.label: Map tags
tags.description: These tags will be used to filter the maps in the list of maps. You can choose one or more tags.

divinityInChart.label: Element chart
divinityInChart.description: Choose if you want to display the divine names number or the qualifications number in the chart.

checkbox.divinity: Display the number of divine names

pointSetTable.nameLang1: Name of the set in language 1
pointSetTable.nameLang2: Name of the set in language 2

pointSetName.description_fr: If you choose to display point sets on different layers, the user will see the point set name in the layer list (legend at bottom right on the map).
pointSetName.description_en: If you choose to display point sets on different layers, the user will see the point set name in the layer list (legend at bottom on the map).

attestationIds.label: Load points from the MAP database
attestationIds.description: Load a CSV file containing the IDs of testimonies from the MAP database.

customPointsFile.label: Load custom points
customPointsFile.description: Load a CSV file containing a list of custom points.

pointColor.label: Point color
pointColor.description: If no color is selected, points will appear in brown.

pointIcon.label: Point icon shape
pointIcon.description: If no shape is selected, points will appear round.

pointSetForm.isLayeredLabel: Display point sets on different layers
pointSetForm.isNbDisplayedLabel: Display the number of sources in point

basic.label: Basic
basic.description: The 'Elements' filter will be built with the list of all elements from the displayed testimonies.

manual.label: Manual
manual.description: The 'Elements' filter will take the form of 2-level checkboxes: a first level with one element, and a second with one or more elements. These two levels can be custom-built below.

greatRegion.label: Great region
greatRegion.description: 'Location' filter will display a select/options with the list of great regions from all displayed testimonies.

subRegion.label: Subregion
subRegion.description: 'Location' filter will display a select/options with the list of subregions from all displayed testimonies.

cityName.label: City name
cityName.description: 'Location' filter will display a select/options with the list of site names from all displayed testimonies.

mapFormPage.addFilters: Add user filters to the map
mapFormPage.filterIntroduction: Up to 2 filters can be added per map, in addition to the time filter which is always displayed.

locationFilter.label: Location filter
locationFilter.description: Displays a select/options element with the list of locations (great regions, subregions or site names, as desired) from all displayed testimonies

languageFilter.label: Language filter (Greek or Semitic)
languageFilter.description: Displays two checkboxes with the options 'Greek' and 'Semitic'.

epithetFilter.label: Elements filter
epithetFilter.description: Two options : displays a select/options element with the list of elements of the displayed testimonies or displays two levels of checkboxes: a first level with one element and a second level with one or more elements. These two levels are to be built on demand.

divinityNbFilter.label: Divinity number filter
divinityNbFilter.description: Displays a double slider with a minimum and maximum value, defined by the number of divinities in the set of displayed testimonies

sourceTypeFilter.label: Source type filter
sourceTypeFilter.description: Displays a select/options element with the list of source types from all displayed sources

agentActivityFilter.label: Agent activity filter
agentActivityFilter.description: Displays a select/options element with the list of agent activities from all displayed testimonies

agentNameFilter.label: Agent name filter
agentNameFilter.description: Displays a select/options element with the list of agent names from all displayed testimonies

agentGenderFilter.label: Agent gender filter
agentGenderFilter.description: Displays checkboxes with male, female or nonbinary options

agentStatusFilter.label: Agent status filter
agentStatusFilter.description: Displays a select/options element with the list of agent status from all displayed testimonies

agentivityFilter.label: Agentivity filter
agentivityFilter.description: Displays a select/options element with the list of agentivity from all displayed testimonies

sourceMaterialFilter.label: Source material filter
sourceMaterialFilter.description: Displays a select/options element with the list of materials from all displayed sources

noFilter.label: I don't want to add a filter
noFilter.description: No filter will be added to the map.

mapFormPage.uploadPointsHelp: Help for creating a CSV file

form.title: the title
form.subtitle: the subtitle
form.csv: Add a CSV file with points
form.uploadTableFr: Add a CSV file with a table in language 1
form.uploadTableEn: Add a CSV file with a table in language 2
form.scrollMapStepList: List of steps for the scrolling map

tags.label: Storymap tags
tags.description: These tags will be used to filter the storymaps in the list of storymaps. You can choose one or more tags.

userManagement.title: Users management
userManagement.passwordManagementMessage: The password will be set by the user when he first logs in.

translationManagement.mapPage.introContent: Introduction of the selection panel in the map (before charts and sources)

divinityManagement.explanation: This page allows you to register the list of identifiers of elements that are divine names. Currently, this list has been generated by a SQL query that retrieves all the ids of elements that are of type 'theonym'.
